CustomField.description: When the dog may need to have some shot. Shown in header.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TODAY() + 60 < (PhysicalExamDue__c ), TODAY() + 60 < (VaccineDueDistemper__c ), TODAY() + 60 < (VaccineDueHepatitis__c ), TODAY() + 60 < (VaccineDueParainfluenza__c), TODAY() + 60 < (VaccineDueParvovirus__c ), TODAY() + 60 < (VaccineDueRabies__c ) ), 'Good ' & IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png', '*'), IF(AND( TODAY() < (PhysicalExamDue__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueDistemper__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueHepatitis__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueParainfluenza__c), TODAY() < (VaccineDueParvovirus__c ), TODAY() < (VaccineDueRabies__c ) ), 'Due Soon ' & IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/warning16.png', '*'), 'Expired ' & IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/error16.png', '*')) )
CustomField.label: Health Record Status
